===Etymology===
From earlier {{zh-l|波斯菜|bōsīcài}}, from {{zh-l|波斯|Persia}} + {{zh-l|菜|greens, vegetable}}. Alternatively, a contraction of {{zh-l|菠薐菜}}. Compare the etymology of {{cog|en|spinach}}.
